Tender Title: North of Tyne Citizens' Assembly on Climate Change
Tender Description: The creation of a Citizens' Assembly to look at a specific set of issues relating to climate change that will produce actionable recommendations for the North of Tyne Combined Authority to consider.
Classification Description: Business and management consultancy and related services

Tender Title: Framework Agreement for the Provision of Specialist Automotive Business Engagement Services
Tender Description: The North East Local Enterprise Partnership (North East LEP) / North of Tyne Combined Authority (NTCA) is seeking to establish a single Supplier Framework Agreement for the provision of Specialist Automotive Business Engagement Services to the North East Local Enterprise Partnership (North East LEP).
Classification Description: Business and management consultancy and related services
